data.fullContent: Carl has always loved broccoli and his favorite thing to do with it is to eat it raw. For dinner he always puts broccoli on his plate. If he's out to eat with friends, he asks the waiter for a big helping. He has broccoli at least once a day. Carl is a college student majoring in liberal arts, and he has heard the rumor that eating broccoli is good for the mind. Although Carl doesn't believe it, he loves the taste of the vegetable so much that he eats it anyway.

q1.translation: 卡尔一直很喜欢吃西兰花，他最喜欢生吃西兰花。晚餐时，他总是把花椰菜放在盘子里。

q2.translation: 卡尔一直很喜欢吃西兰花，他最喜欢生吃西兰花。晚餐时，他总是把花椰菜放在盘子里。如果他和朋友出去吃饭，他会让服务员给他一大份。他每天至少吃一次花椰菜。Carl是一名文科专业的大学生，他听说吃西兰花对大脑有好处。虽然卡尔不相信，但他太喜欢蔬菜的味道了，所以他还是吃了。

options.sentence: Even though they didn't really care for the taste, Carl's family would always have broccoli at every meal.
Carl eats broccoli because he loves the taste, not because of the rumors that it's good for his mind.
Carl is a college sophomore who has always had a passion for the arts and has even taken several art classes.
Carl's roommate doesn't like broccoli because he thinks it doesn't taste very good.
